caption: Líneas Telefónicas
query: SELECT phone_number.* FROM client as cl INNER JOIN account as ac ON ac.client_id = cl.id INNER JOIN unit as u ON u.account_id = ac.id INNER JOIN device as d ON d.id = u.device_id INNER JOIN phone_number ON phone_number.id = d.phone_number_id WHERE cl.id = @clientIdx ORDER BY 2
